metadata.title: CVE-2022-30256 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MaraDNS Deadwood through 3.5.0021 that allowsvariant V1 of unintended domain name resolution. A revoked domain name canstill be resolvable for a long time, including expired domains andtaken-down malicious domains. The effects of an exploit would be widespreadand highly impactful, because the exploitation conforms to de facto DNSspecifications and operational practices, and overcomes current mitigationpatches for "Ghost" domain names.

criterions.comment: maradns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
